content: this pattern has a video tutorial to accompany left https //youtu be/7tilhmdw7c8 right https //youtu be/ewljyzolwso standing promotion on all written patterns all of the time why just buy one get more patterns and save more buy 2 for 20% off buy 3 for 30% off buy 4 or more for 40% off youtube https //www youtube com/channel/ucu27-xjgrqpr3pxsngbi3ig like us on facebook https //www facebook com/jolieknotscrochet/ view_public_f… join the jolie knots crochet community facebook group https //www facebook com/groups/2541380872756259/ instagram https //www instagram com/jolieknotscrochet/ hl=en description worked top down back/forth row at first then in rounds separating at the bottom for length customization material 4 25mm hook 2 weight yarn i used 610 yds of hobbii twister for 2xl 2 stitch markers gauge 17sts x 8 row = 4 inches chain 18 work first 8 row of pattern abbreviations treble_crochet - treble_crochet double_crochet - double_crochet single_crochet - single_crochet half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet chain - chain skip - skip space - space sts - stitches chsp - chain spae sizes available written as listed s m l xl 2x 3x 4x 5x based off bust measurement small - 34 inch bust - 500 yds 5x - 62 inch bust - 900 yds
